thread_replies.text: Defense sucks, special teams sucks. They needed the Falcons to commit a stupid amount of penalties to even be in the game. Bowles needs to go. Won't solve everything, but this team just doesn't give a sh*t. And the fans know it, dead quiet all night in that place.
